issue.title: [C++] Build jemalloc in parallel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3492](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3492). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we build the vendored jemalloc with `make`. We should use `make -j` to build on all available cores.
